name: Confederation of Icelandic Enterprise
goal: The Confederation of Icelandic Enterprise is a service organization for Icelandic businesses. SA projects include negotiations of collective agreements with unions on wages and working conditions, the advocation of an internationally competitive legal and regulatory environment, and the interpretation and communication of decisions by governmental authorities that directly affect the business environment.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives: SA follows developments in various areas related to the EEA and the Single Market as well as promoting the interests of Icelandic businesses abroad.
